擽擽擽

擽字的基本解释

擽
lì
击：“射游枭，擽蜚遽。”

擽
luò
坚定：“擽然扶持心国，且若是其固也。”

擽
yuè
竭。

擽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lüè］
［《廣韻》離灼切，入藥，來。］
亦作“攊1”。
(1)击；敲击。
(2)冲击。参见“擽陳”。
(3)超越。
[②]［luò］
［《集韻》歷各切，入鐸，來。］
亦作“攊2”。
坚貌。

擽字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擽； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页461第27
【唐韻】離灼切【集韻】力灼切，?音略。擊也。【唐書·胡証傳】証膂力絕人，取鐵燈檠，擽合其跗，橫膝上，謂客曰：飮不釂者，以此擊之。　又【唐韻】郞擊切【集韻】郞敵切，?音歷。義同。又捎也。或作攦。又作攊。　又【集韻】弋灼切，音藥。竭也。　又歷各切，音洛。亦擊也。與挌同。

擽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擽字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lüè］
["Guang Yun" Li Zhuo cut, used as medicine, come. ]
Also known as "攊1".
(1) Percussion; percussion.
(2) Impact. See "Juan Chen".
(3) Transcendence.
[②]［luò］
["Jiyun" go through each cut, enter the duo, come. ]
Also known as "攊2".
Firm appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　擽; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 461 27
[Tang Yun] Li Zhuoqi [Ji Yun] Shaoqi with strength, sound slightly. Hit also. [Tang Shu·Hu Zhengzhuan] The strength of the card is extremely strong, take the iron lamp bar, slap it on the tarsal, horizontally on the knee, the guest said: the one who does not squat, hit it with this.　[Tang Yun] Tan hit and cut [Ji Yun] Tan Di cut,? Sound calendar. The same meaning. Take it again. Or slap. Scratch again.　 [Ji Yun] Yi Zhuo cut, sound medicine. Exhausted.　Finally, Yin Luo. Also hit also. Same as Tit.
